Description: Simple cloth pads worn over the shoulders, offering minimal protection against abrasions while maximizing flexibility.
Leather pads designed to protect the shoulders from minor impacts and cuts, allowing for decent mobility.
Leather pauldrons reinforced with metal studs, providing enhanced defense against slashing and blunt force attacks.
Thickly padded pauldrons that absorb impact, offering moderate protection without sacrificing much flexibility.
Kevlar-lined pauldrons providing resistance to small-caliber bullets and shrapnel while remaining lightweight.
Advanced Kevlar pauldrons with reinforced plates, offering superior protection against ballistic threats and maintaining shoulder mobility.
Pauldrons made of composite materials, offering balanced protection against impacts and environmental hazards.
Titanium-plated pauldrons providing strong defense against physical attacks while being relatively lightweight for agile movement.
Lightweight pauldrons woven with titanium fibers, offering high durability and protection against impacts with minimal weight.
Pauldrons embedded with ceramic plates, providing superior defense against energy and ballistic weapons.
Advanced plasteel pauldrons, highly resistant to energy and kinetic attacks while being light enough to maintain mobility.
Pauldrons treated with plasma-hardening processes, offering exceptional resistance to energy and thermal attacks.
Flexible pauldrons made from nano-fiber mesh, providing high protection against physical and energy threats.
Pauldrons embedded with energy-diffusing tech, reducing damage from energy-based attacks and deflecting projectiles.
Ultra-light pauldrons made from quantum fibers, offering superior protection while allowing for maximum agility.
Pauldrons enhanced with graviton technology, deflecting projectiles and dispersing impact force to reduce injury.
Pauldrons interwoven with void energy, providing high resistance against physical, psionic, and energy attacks.
Nearly indestructible pauldrons offering unmatched protection, though their weight requires considerable strength to use effectively.
Pauldrons that incorporate temporal distortions, allowing the wearer to phase through time to avoid damage.
Pauldrons infused with dark matter, capable of absorbing kinetic and energy attacks into an extradimensional space.
Pauldrons made from rare Etherium metal, providing high resistance to physical, energy, and psionic attacks.
Psionically enhanced pauldrons that adapt to the wearerâ€™s mental commands, offering dynamic protection and mobility.
Pauldrons made from hyper-alloy, offering near-impenetrable defense without significantly hindering shoulder movement.
Pauldrons embedded with self-repairing nanites, ensuring continuous durability and protection in extended combat.
Pauldrons with embedded quantum fields, creating a protective barrier that deflects a wide range of attacks.
The ultimate pauldrons forged from hypersteel, providing unmatched resistance to all forms of damage while surprisingly maintaining some flexibility for shoulder movement.
